description.p: RustConn is a modern connection manager for Linux with a GTK4/Wayland-native interface. Manage SSH, RDP, VNC, SPICE, Telnet, and Zero Trust connections from a single application. All core protocols use embedded Rust implementations — no external dependencies required.
Protocols (embedded Rust implementations):

ul.li: SSH with embedded VTE terminal and split view
RDP via IronRDP (embedded, with FreeRDP fallback)
VNC via vnc-rs (embedded, with TigerVNC fallback)
SPICE via remote-viewer (external)
Telnet via external telnet client (port 23)
Zero Trust: AWS SSM, GCP IAP, Azure Bastion, OCI Bastion, Cloudflare, Teleport, Tailscale, Boundary
